title: 99acres Real Estate & Property
description:
99acres – Real Estate & Property Search in India.
The new 99acres Android app is here to take your property search experience mobile. Now you can search and discover properties even on the go. 99acres mobile app makes it extremely easy to search buy, sell or rent property in India. Users can visually explore apartment, farm house , flat, house ,builder floor, plot, villa, commercial office, shops, factory through rich photos, attractive videos, interactive maps and many other details. The app also enables users to view photos and videos of society/locality of a property.
This free real estate app for Android has everything you have loved on 99acres.com. The app has detailed property listings, latest information about new projects and local real estate information. This is surely one of the best property apps for all your property needs.
99acres as a real estate portal has won several prestigious awards as follows:-
- Most Innovative mobile app in real estate category - GSF Mobile Appies 2015
- Most Admired Real Estate Portal - CMO ASIA Awards 2012
- Best Real Estate Portal - BCI Awards 2012
- Best Online Realty Portal - Accommodation Times Awards 2012
Why 99acres Android App is the Best Property app in India?
✔ Search property on the Go! :- Finding your dream property on the move is now possible. Add more speed and convenience to your property search. Busy schedules will no longer hinder your search for a home.
✔ A great house hunting app:- Search residential or commercial properties for sale or rent. With photos, interactive maps and videos of localities, societies and properties, you get a clearer picture of what you are looking for online.
✔ Quick information:- You can instantly call or contact the property advertisers, builders or owners and book your home.
✔ Saves money:- The app allows advertisers to post property advertisement for free within seconds. Owners, builders and property dealers , all can enjoy the hassle free experience of selling their property.
✔ Its Android. It's free! :- 99acres' innovation combined with the native power of Android will give you the best possible user experience, all for free.
---- Key Features ------
✔ SEARCH: Search easily amongst over 10 lac properties in India and abroad.
✔ REFINE: Use search filters to refine your search and discover the exact property you were always looking for - either Residential or Commercial.
✔ RECENT ACTIVITY: Refer to your recent activity section to view all your past search activity with your last searches along with the filters applied, last viewed properties and projects, last contacted properties and projects all at a single place
✔SELL: Advertise your property for Rent or Sale within few seconds. Manage your active listings on the go.
✔VIEW LEADS: View all the leads to your active listings and check their messages or call them up by a single tap
✔ BROWSE NEW PROJECTS: Browse your preferred city and locality to discover Hot, Under Construction, Newly launched and Ready to Move Projects, both residential and commercial
✔MAP: View a property on Map along with nearby amenities such as ATM, Park, bus stand, airport, school, restaurant, mall, taxi, railway station etc.
✔ CALL: Call property & new project Advertisers instantly
✔ MESSAGE: Send SMS/EMAIL to property advertisers for free
✔ ADD CONTACT: Save the contact details of property advertisers in your phonebook.
✔ SHORTLIST: Shortlist properties or projects you like and view them later in detail in your free time
✔ MY99ACRES ACCOUNT: Create and manage your my99acres account on the move
About 99acres.com :-
99acres.com is an Indian property portal, which provides residential and commercial real estate information. The website started in 2005 by Info Edge India Pvt. Ltd, is a platform where buyers and sellers can exchange information.
Let us know what you think! Rate our app, or send feedback to feedback@99acres.com
